name: AudioBytePacketTranslation
desc: A data structure used by the kAudioFilePropertyByteToPacket and kAudioFilePropertyPacketToByte properties.

items.name: init(mByte: Int64, mPacket: Int64, mByteOffsetInPacket: UInt32, mFlags: AudioBytePacketTranslationFlags)
var mByteOffsetInPacket: UInt32

items.name: var mFlags: AudioBytePacketTranslationFlags
